thread.title: GAO: Pentagon fails to address ethical problems
thread.title_full: GAO: Pentagon fails to address ethical problems

title: GAO: Pentagon fails to address ethical problems
text:
04 GAO: Pentagon fails to address ethical problems 
Army Times: The Defense Department has failed to follow through on several key initiatives designed to reduce ethics problems and poor professionalism in the military, according to a new report from the Government Accountability Office.
